name: Low Cal Tide
description: Play as a shark who's desperately trying not to eat anybody! Swim around and eat as much kelp as you can. But watch out! There are people and ships trying to take you down with their hooks and harpoons! Boost around and slam them into the walls to dispatch of them quickly. If you get hooked too many times, you may just have to break your kelp diet to get out of there...
